quotes.message: You do what you can for as long as you can, and when you finally can't, you do the next best thing. You back up but you don't give up.
quotes.name: Chuck Yeager

quotes.message: Leaders believe that falling is not failing, but refusal to rise up after falling is the real form of failure!
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.name: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.message: As long as you've done your best, making mistakes doesn't matter. You and I are human; we will mess up. What counts is learning from your mistakes and getting back up when life has knocked you down.
quotes.name: Shawn Johnson

quotes.message: No matter how many times you get knocked down, keep getting back up. God sees your resolve. He sees your determination. And when you do everything you can do, that's when God will step in and do what you can't do.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: I'm most proud of the blessings that God has bestowed upon me, in my life. He's given me the vision to truly see that you can fall down, but you can still get back up. Hopefully I'll learn from my mistakes and have the opportunity to strengthen and improve the next thing I do.
quotes.name: Martin Lawrence

quotes.message: You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.
quotes.name: Shaun White

quotes.message: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep walking.
quotes.name: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.message: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: It is easy to fall, but hard to rise.
quotes.name: Dann Moudry

quotes.message: Those who mastered in the art of falling have no fear of rising!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand
quotes.name: Hayley Williams

quotes.message: It's not up to you how you fall.
quotes.name: Sr. Tac Jeffrey Mitchell

quotes.message: Being defeated is often temporary, giving up makes it permanent.
quotes.name: Marilyn von Savant

quotes.message: Fall seven times. Stand up eight.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
quotes.name: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: It's not the failures in our life that define us, it's the moments when we decide that getting back up is all that matters
quotes.name: Joel Brown

quotes.message: Everyone falls down. Getting back up is how you learn how to walk.
quotes.name: Walt Disney

quotes.message: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The most beautiful people I've known are those who have known trials, have known struggles, have known loss, and have found their way out of the depths.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing in the world to do. But to hold it together when everyone else would understand if you fell apart, that's true strength.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Keep going, keep going come what may.
quotes.name: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.message: Life ... is not about how fast you run or even with what degree of grace. It's about perseverance, about staying on your feet and slogging forward no matter what.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: A champion is someone who gets up, even when he can't.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: It's better to start over than to give up entirely.
quotes.name: Kevin Ngo

quotes.message: Most great people have attained their greatest success one step beyond their greatest failure.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: You drown not by falling into a river, but by staying submerged in it.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The secret of life isn't what happens to you, but what you do with what happens to you.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: It's hard to beat a person that never gives up.
quotes.name: Babe Ruth

quotes.message: A Quitter never wins-and-a Winner never quits.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
quotes.name: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.message: Falling and getting back up is what brings you success.
quotes.name: Tony Horton

quotes.message: When life knocks you down, Get back up and fight harder.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: We have one treasure left; the daring after despair.
quotes.name: Yitzhak Lamden

quotes.message: Success is sweet: the sweeter if long delayed and attained through manifold struggles and defeats.
quotes.name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.message: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
quotes.name: Epictetus

quotes.message: Whatever you're going through, many others have not only experienced the same but got out of it just fine.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: Once you choose hope, anything's possible
quotes.name: Christopher Reeve

quotes.message: The first step is you have to say that you can
quotes.name: Will Smith

quotes.message: They showed you no respect . What kept you driven then . What kept you going in the ring . And getting back up to fight for a different end.
quotes.name: D. Arnold

quotes.message: We all fall down . It's the getting' back up that really counts . We live and we learn . To help someone up when it's their turn.
quotes.name: Arlis Albritton

quotes.message: And your worlds stop when your falling out of love . But it's not the fall that's so hard . It's the getting back up.
quotes.name: Cannon Goodman

quotes.message: I Already told you that falling is easy . It's getting back up that becomes the problem . If you don't believe you can find a way out . You become the problem.
quotes.name: Catherine Roseanne Dennis

quotes.message: Even if you fall, it isn't over . You're here 'til the end . Nothing's stopping you . From getting back up again.
quotes.name: Stefano Giorgini

quotes.message: Falling down is life . Living is getting back up again.
quotes.name: Kellen McGregor

quotes.message: Everybody trips and everybody falls . But you gotta keep getting back up . Some people quit and that's why they lose . But you know that don't have to be us.
quotes.name: Adam Stuart Argyle

quotes.message: There's something to be said about . Straight on knees and falling down . Getting' right back up again . And givin' all you have to give.
quotes.name: Danielle Peck

quotes.message: I'm rising up . Up to the streets . And you're gonna feel . The rhythm of me . I'm rising up . You're gonna see . You're gonna see . You can't stop me.
quotes.name: Ricky Summer

quotes.message: Rising up, straight to the top . Had the guts, got the glory . Went the distance, now I'm not going to stop . Just a man and his will to survive.
quotes.name: Jim Peterik

quotes.message: I'm rising up this time . through the hands of time.
quotes.name: Roger Dale Jr Clem

quotes.message: The best part of falling is getting back up again.
quotes.name: David Belle

quotes.message: There is no shame in falling down but there is pride in getting back up.
quotes.name: Lilly Singh

quotes.message: It's all about... getting back up and getting back to work and striving to be the best you can be.
quotes.name: Robbie Lawler

quotes.message: You can't lose confidence in yourself, or you've lost already. When you get knocked down, you've got to keep getting back up.
quotes.name: Tim Tebow

quotes.message: Get knocked down. Get back up. Always be a fighter. Don't be afraid of the punch. Don't be afraid of getting back up. Be afraid of giving up.
quotes.name: Maria Kanellis

quotes.message: When you get knocked down, don't stay down; get back up again. Nothing good is going to happen as long as you're down on yourself.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Life is easy when you're hot. But what happens when the ball bounces the other way? You just keep getting back up and climbing up.
quotes.name: Bill Walton

quotes.message: There comes a time in your life, when you walk away from all the drama and people who create it. You surround yourself with people who make you laugh. Forget the bad and focus on the good. Love the people who treat you right, pray for the ones who do not. Life is too short to be anything but happy. Falling down is a part of life, getting back up is living.
quotes.name: Jose N. Harris

quotes.message: In life its not about falling down or not, it's about getting back up.
quotes.name: Nathan Hangen

quotes.message: You will face hard times in life. Sometimes they are supposed to come, sometimes not. Get through them no matter what, 'cause the good life is always on the other side.
quotes.name: F.C.

quotes.message: When setbacks arise - and they will from time to time - regroup, recharge, refocus and refine.
quotes.name: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.message: Nothing or no one is going to rescue you from your current situation. You must take control of your own well-being and forge your own path to happiness and fulfillment.
quotes.name: Germany Kent

quotes.message: One of the things is we tend to give up too soon. We get knocked down a couple of times, and we stay down. It's so important to get back up again.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: If one dream dies, dream another dream. If you get knocked down, get back up and go again.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: Sometimes you fall down, but you have to pick yourself back up.
quotes.name: Vitor Belfort

quotes.message: It's really sad sometimes that you have to go to that extreme bottom to find your way back up, but it's true.
quotes.name: Ivan Moody

quotes.message: Everybody, at some point in their life, has fallen down and not felt like getting back up, but you have to, no matter how difficult it is.
quotes.name: Charlie Hunnam
